name.baseName: Corn-based ethylene production ; Ethylene ; Ethanol dehydration ; Corn
基于玉米秸秆乙烯生产 ; 乙烯 ; 乙醇脱水 ; 玉米秸秆

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Two alternative ethanol production scenarios, corn-based and cassava-based, were tested for ethylene production.
本研究对两种替代乙醇生产方案（基于玉米秸秆和基于木薯）的乙烯生产进行了评估。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1 tonne of ethylene production.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Data related to the operation process (e.g., electricity, steam, water, chemicals, raw material consumption, and direct emissions) from the cassava-based ethanol and corn-based ethylene production plants in the Guangxi and Anhui Provinces in China were used [20], [21].
相关生产数据（例如电力、蒸汽、水、化学品、原材料消耗和直接排放）来源于中国广西省玉米秸秆乙烯生产工厂。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Processes included in present study are summarized as follows:1) Corn production at farm; 2) Ethanol and ethylene production; 3) Machinery drying;4) Road transport;5) Waste treatment; 6) Material and coal based energy production;7) Energy recovery on site.
本研究包括的过程总结如下：1）玉米秸秆生产；2）乙醇和乙烯生产；3）原料干燥；4）公路运输；5）废物处理；6) 材料和煤炭能源生产；7）生产能源回收。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set describes the production of ethylene through ethanol dehydration using corn stover as a feedstock. This ethylene may be utilized in various industrial applications such as the production of polyethylene plastics, as an intermediate in the manufacture of other chemicals, and as a ripening agent for certain fruits.
该数据集描述了使用玉米秸秆作为原料通过乙醇脱水生产乙烯的过程。此乙烯可用于各种工业应用，如聚乙烯塑料生产、用作其他化学品制造的中间体，以及作为某些水果的催熟剂。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Co-product allocation based on product mass was performed.
进行了基于产品质量的联产品分配。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Data related to the operation process (e.g., electricity, steam, water, chemicals, raw material consumption, and direct emissions) from the cassava-based ethanol and corn-based ethylene production plants in the Guangxi and Anhui Provinces in China were used.2. The data related to corn and cassava production at farms, coal-based electricity generation, and road transport processes were taken from the references.3. Moreover, data on chemical production and relevant background data from Europe were used [26] because of the lack of information for China.
相关生产数据（例如电力、蒸汽、水、化学品、原材料消耗和直接排放）来源于中国广西玉米秸秆乙烯生产工厂。2. 玉米秸秆生产、燃煤发电和公路运输过程的相关数据取自参考文献。3. 由于缺乏中国的信息，因此使用了欧洲的化学品生产数据和相关背景数据[26]。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Hong, J., Zhang, Y., Xu, X. & Li, X. Life cycle assessment of corn- and cassava-based ethylene production. Biomass and Bioenergy 67, 304–311 (2014).
Hong, J., Zhang, Y., Xu, X. & Li, X. Life cycle assessment of corn- and cassava-based ethylene production. Biomass and Bioenergy 67, 304–311 (2014).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data set, users should consider the geographical scope of the study, as the primary data are sourced from specific regions within China. Attention should be paid to the energy mix and technology level represented by the data, as it may differ from other regions. The methodological choice of co-product allocation based on product mass should be factored into comparative assessments. Users should ensure the functional unit of 1 tonne of ethylene aligns with their study scope. For international comparisons or extensions, additional data adjustments may be needed to reflect different conditions and practices.
在使用该生命周期评估数据集时，用户应考虑研究的地理范围，因为原始数据来自中国特定地区。应注意数据所代表的能源组合和技术水平可能与其他地区不同。基于产品质量的联产品分配的方法学选择应纳入比较评估中。用户应确保1吨乙烯的功能单位与他们的研究范围一致。对于国际比较或扩展，可能需要进行额外的数据调整，以反映不同的条件和做法。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
